body_html:
This is an awesome doc and thank you for taking the time to write it. The non-deterministic nature of the GPU reductions has been confusing people for a long time.

However, I'm not sure that it makes sense to pull this in for the brief period of time before the new reductions go in.

body:
This is an awesome doc and thank you for taking the time to write it.  The non-deterministic nature of the GPU reductions has been confusing people for a long time.

However, I'm not sure that it makes sense to pull this in for the brief period of time before the new reductions go in.
